overview: Prior to founding Vendux and architecting its enterprise social networking platform, Alex served as Vice President of services at Fortux, a consulting company providing software architecture and security infrastructure expertise on the enterprise market in banking, financial services and telecommunications. Previously, Alex was a professional services consultant with BEA Systems, a leading enterprise infrastructure vendor. Prior to BEA, he developed trading system technology at the IBM securities division. Alex holds a Doctorate degree in Physics and Mathematics and Master’s degree in Computer Science.
